content.full_text: Abraham Lincoln to Robert S. Blackwell, 27 July 18431 Yours of the 18thinclosing your license is received—2I have had it perfected, and herewith return it to you— Nothing new here—
paragraphs: Abraham Lincoln to Robert S. Blackwell, 27 July 18431
Yours of the 18thinclosing your license is received—2I have had it perfected, and herewith return it to you—

footnotes.text:
1The letter was written and signed by Abraham Lincoln. He also authored the address
                  on the last page, which was folded to create an envelope for mailing.
2Robert S. Blackwell’s letter of July 18 has not been located.

structured_content.text: Abraham Lincoln to Robert S. Blackwell, 27 July 18431
